All Classes

  • Class Description
    Anchorable  
    AnchorPoint
    An AnchorPoint denotes the point of an Entity which is being used for placement on the x,y-coordinate.
    AnimationTimerFactory
    An AnimationTimerFactory should be used to create instances of an AnimationTimer.
    AnimationTimerHandler  
    AnnotationProcessor  
    AudioRepository
    An AudioRepository provides a central repository for acquiring audio files.
    BackgroundDelegate
    A BackgroundDelegate follows the Delegate pattern and embraces Composition over Inheritence.
    Bounded
    Implementing this interface exposes the Bounded.getNonTransformedBounds() method, which returns the bounds, aka Bounding Box, of this Entity.
    BufferedMoveable  
    Clearable
    Denote that this Object can be cleared.
    Configurable
    Implementing Configurable denotes the Object can, and usually must, be configured before it can be used.
    ContinuousRotatable  
    Debugger
    The Debugger is used to gather and show in game debug information.
    DebugGridPaneFactory
    A DebugGridPaneFactory should be used for creating instances of GridPane for use in the Debugger.
    DebugLabelFactory
    A value shown in the Debugger.
    DefaultMotionApplier
    A DefaultMotionApplier is an implementation of MotionApplier that does not abide the laws of Physics and only provides basis behaviour regarding speed and direction.
    Destroyable
    Denote that this Object is Destroyable and hence ensures maximum Objects eligible for Garbage Collection.
    DimensionsProvider
    Implementing the DimensionsProvider interface exposes the DimensionsProvider.getWidth() and DimensionsProvider.getHeight() methods.
    Direction
    Convenience enum for setting the Direction
    DirectionProvider
    A DirectionProvider exposes a method to acquire the direction.
    DynamicRectangleEntity
    An DynamicRectangleEntity extends all behaviour of a RectangleEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.
    DynamicScene
    Instantiate a new DynamicScene.
    DynamicSpriteEntity
    An DynamicSpriteEntity extends all behaviour of a SpriteEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.
    DynamicTextEntity
    An DynamicTextEntity extends all behaviour of a TextEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.
    Entity
    An Entity will serve as the Root Interface for all objects that are part of a YaegerScene.
    EntityCollection
    An EntityCollection encapsulates all behaviour related to all instances of Entity that are part of a YaegerScene.
    EntityCollectionFactory
    A EntityCollectionFactory can be used to create instances of EntityCollection.
    EntityCollectionStatistics
    An EntityCollectionStatistics is a DTO (Data Transfer Object) that contains all current values from an EntityCollection.
    EntityMotionInitBuffer
    An EntityMotionInitBuffer is used to support the option to set the speed and direction of an Entity from the constructor.
    EntitySpawner
    An EntitiySpawner is the abstract superclass that should be extended to create an object that spawns a subclass of Entity.
    EntitySupplier
    An EntitySupplier encapsulates a HashSet of instances of Entity.
    ImageFactory
    An ImageFactory should be used for creating instance of Image.
    ImagePatternFactory
    An ImagePatternFactory should be used for creating instance of ImagePattern.
    ImageRepository
    An ImageRepository provides a central repository for acquiring sprites.
    ImageViewFactory
    An ImageViewFactory should be used for creating instance of ImageView.
    Initializable
    Stating an Object is Initializable exposes the init lifecycle hook.
    Initializer  
    JavaFXEntity
    A JavaFXEntity can be used to display anything that is a child of a Node.
    KeyListenerDelegate
    A KeyListenerDelegate follows the Delegate pattern and embraces Composition over Inheritence.
    Location
    A Location is a 2D geometric point that represents a pair of coordinates.
    LocationUpdater
    A LocationUpdater can calculate a new location.
    MotionApplier
    Base interface of all Objects that apply a motion to a subclass of Entity.
    MotionModifier
    A MotionModifier is capable of modifying a motion.
    Moveable  
    NodeProvider
    Being a NodeProvider guarantees that a Node, if set, is accessible.
    Placeable
    A Placeable has a methods that can be used to place it at a different x,y-coordinates on the YaegerScene.
    Pong
    Elementary implementation of the PONG game.
    RectangleEntity
    A RectangleEntity provides the option to use a drawable Rectangle as an Entity.
    Removeable
    A Removeable denotes an Object, most likely an Entity, that is eligible for removance from its parent.
    RequiresInjection
    Implementing this interface states that this Object requires injection of dependencies.
    Rotatable
    Implementing the interface Rotatable will result in de availability of the Rotatable.setRotate(double) method.
    SceneBorder  
    SceneBorderCrossingWatcher
    Implement this interface to be notified if the Entity crosses the boundary of the YaegerScene.
    SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
    Implement this interface to be notified if the Entity touches the boundary of the YaegerScene.
    SceneChild
    A SceneChild is part of a YaegerScene and has thus access to width and height of the YaegerScene it is part of.
    SceneCollection
    A SceneCollection contains all instances of YaegerScene that are part of a Game.
    SceneCollectionFactory
    A SceneCollectionFactory can be used to create instances of SceneCollection.
    SceneFactory
    A SceneFactory can be used to create instances of Scene.
    Size
    A Size encapsulates the width and height.
    SpeedProvider
    A SpeedProvider exposes a method to acquire the speed.
    SplashScene
    A Splash Screen, being an instance of YaegerScene that will be shown a given number of miliseconds at the start of a YaegerApplication.
    SplashScreenFactory
    The factory to be used for creating instances of SplashScene.
    SpriteAnimationDelegateFactory  
    SpriteEntity
    A SpriteEntity is a Entity that is represented by an Image.
    StaticScene  
    StatisticsObserver
    A StatisticsObserver will function as the Observer from the Observable-pattern, for changes in the EntityCollectionStatistics.
    TextEntity
    A TextEntity can be used to display a line of text on a YaegerScene.
    TileFactory
    The TileFactory should be used for creating instances of SpriteEntity that will be part of a TileMap.
    TileMap
    A TileMap encapsulate a two-dimensional map of SpriteEntity.
    TimeableAnimationTimer
    An AnimationTimer that calls its handle() method on the given interval, and not the default 60 times per second.
    TimeableAnimationTimerHandler
    A Functional Interface to be used for the handler of a AnimationTimer.
    Timer
    Abstract superclass of all timers that are available for both a YaegerScene and an Entity.
    Updatable
    Implement this interface to be updated every cycle of the game loop.
    UpdatableProvider  
    UpdateDelegator
    An Updatable that delegates the update to an Updater.
    Updater
    An Updater contains a List of Updatable to which the update method will be delegated.
    WithSupplier  
    WithTileMapList
    Implementing the WithTileMapList interface guarantees that a List of instances of TileMap is available.
    WithTileMaps
    Implementing this interface exposes the WithTileMaps.addTileMap(TileMap) method.
    WithTimerList
    Implementing the WithTimerList interface guarantees that a List of instances of Timer is available.
    WithTimers
    Implementing this interface exposes the WithTimers.addTimer(Timer) method.
    YaegerApplication
    YaegerApplication is the base class that must be extended to create a Yaeger game.
    YaegerScene
    A YaegerScene encapsulates a scene or level from a Yaeger Game.
    YaegerShowCase
    ShowCase of all Yaeger Features.
    YaegerStage
